channel.title: Pod on the Apex
channel.itunes:author: Pratyush Nalam, Aniket Mohan
channel.description: Pratyush and Aniket bring the F1 circus to your screen! New episodes every Wednesday.

item.title: Welcome to Pod on the Apex!
item.description: Are you an F1 fan? Does the sound of the engine revving excite you behind your wildest dreams? Well, you have come to the right place! Introducing #PodOnTheApex! Pratyush and Aniket bring the F1 circus with all its action on and off the track right to your screen! Get ready for an insightful and entertaining discussion of what to look forward in the 2025 season and how these 2 gearheads started their obsession with this adrenaline-filled sport!

item.title: Ranking the 2025 F1 Liveries!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, we discuss the F1 75 extravaganza and then rank all the TEN 2025 F1 liveries! Join us, Pratyush and Aniket, for a whirlwind and fun discussion and watch us rank our favorites! Do you agree with our rankings? Let us know!

item.title: 2025 Formula 1 Season Predictions - Part 1!
item.description: In this special episode of #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket serve up some pre-season predictions! We play fortune teller with the bottom 5 constructors from the 2024 championship and throw up some hot takes along the way! Do you agree with our rankings? Let us know and don't forget to stay tuned for part 2!

item.title: 2025 Formula 1 Season Predictions - Part 2!
item.description: In this special episode of #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket serve up the second part of our pre-season predictions! It is now time to play fortune teller with the top 5 constructors from the 2024 championship and throw up some more hot takes along the way! Do you agree with our rankings? Let us know!

item.title: Testing Retrospective and Awaiting Australia!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex: Did pre-season testing in Bahrain reveal the 2025 pecking order? We dive into the details! Plus, are you excited for the 2026 grid turning it up to 11? And what about the V10 comeback rumors? Join Pratyush and Aniket for the complete lowdown!

item.title: Zooming into Melbourne!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket preview the Australian GP and discuss the swearing ban as we eagerly await the five lights to go out on the 2025 F1 season!

item.title: It is a papaya world at Melbourne!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket review the Australian GP, preview the Chinese GP, and toss up some spicy predictions!

item.title: Catching our breath from the Shanghai drama!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket review the Chinese GP and unpack the shocking Liam Lawson story!

item.title: Time to dance through the Suzuka Esses!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket preview the Japanese GP, break down the paddock reactions of the Lawson-Tsunoda swap, and are thrilled about a possible V10 return!

item.title: Awaiting Sakhir after the Suzuka Snoozefest!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket review the sleepy Japanese GP, wonder what is going wrong at Ferrari, and look forward to more excitement from the Bahrain GP!

item.title: Looking ahead to Jeddah after a wild weekend at Sakhir!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket dive into the chaotic Bahrain GP, debate the many surprising technical failures on Sunday, and call out the subpar race direction before ending with predictions for the Saudi Arabian GP!

item.title: Piastri rules supreme at Jeddah but where is Lando?
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket unpack all the drama from the Saudi Arabian GP (including _that_ Verstappen-Piastri incident), scrutinize Lewis Hamilton's perplexing struggles, and yearn for even more inter-papaya racing action (come on Lando!) on track! Also addressed is the frustrating resurgence of dirty air and its subsequent impact on overtakes in 2025!

item.title: More Papaya Domination at Miami?
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket bring you spicy Miami GP predictions, explore the special liveries and uniforms for this weekend, look forward to Sergio Pérez's potential return in 2026, commemorate Ayrton Senna's tragic accident 31 years ago, and give a sneak peek at the new Madring unveiled this week!

item.title: Prancing into the Pain at Miami!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket rue a terrible Miami GP weekend for Ferrari, salute Oscar Piastri's rich vein of form, and cautiously wonder about Jack Doohan's future!

item.title: Give Us Papaya-Flavored Tamburello Drama at Imola!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket preview the Imola GP with their patented predictions, take some more digs at the Alpine kerfuffle, and give their verdict on the updated FIA swearing guidelines!

item.title: Time to Du Du Du Du at Imola!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket bring to you the resurgence of Red Bull and Max Verstappen, Ferrari's dramatic turnaround from Saturday to Sunday, and explore the McLaren dilemma!

item.title: Will Monaco See a Winning Return for the Prince?
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket preview the Monaco GP and give you their predictions, talk about Max Verstappen missing the F1 movie premiere, and what Adrian Newey's latest interview tells us about Aston Martin!

item.title: Snoozing in Monte Carlo!
item.description: This week on #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket bring to you the snoozefest aka the Monaco GP and throw around some wild ideas to make the jewel of the Riviera more interesting, and tackle the hottest question from the weekend - does Lewis Hamilton need a new race engineer at Ferrari?

item.title: Slicing Papayas in Spielberg!
item.description: After a brief hiatus, #PodOnTheApex is back! In this episode, Pratyush and Aniket bring to you all the drama from the Austrian GP! Get some papaya-flavored popcorn ready!

item.title: Getting Ready for Sir Lewis's Homecoming!
item.description: In this episode of #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket are gearing up for the British GP, unveiling their predictions with plenty of excitement around Lewis Hamilton, discussing a potential blockbuster move for the 2026 driver market, breaking down some fresh Alpine drama, and showcasing the special liveries for this weekend!

item.title: Celebrating A Long-Awaited Hulkenpodium at Silverstone!
item.description: In this episode of #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket celebrate Nico Hulkenberg's historic first-ever F1 podium! They also dissect the controversial Piastri penalty and all the drama and kerfuffle caused by the wild ever-changing Silverstone weather!

item.title: Christian Horner FIRED!
item.description: In this special episode of #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket react to the shocking departure of Christian Horner from Red Bull Racing and explore what's next for Max Verstappen, Christian Horner, and Red Bull Racing!

item.title: Reviewing the F1 Movie!
item.description: In this episode of #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket review the much-hyped F1 movie sharing their unfiltered takes on where it hits and where it misses, ponder what it means for the future of the sport, and offer up some suggestions to revolutionize how we watch the sport!

item.title: Will Spa Deliver Another Classic?
item.description: In this episode of #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket preview everyone's favorite race on the calendar, the Belgian GP, introducing a new format for their predictions, discussing Ferrari's upgrades for the weekend, and exploring what to expect for Red Bull following Christian Horner's departure!

item.title: The FIA Robbed Us of a Spectacle at Spa!
item.description: In this episode of #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket lament the FIA's botched handling of the Belgian GP, openly wonder if Lando Norris has the fortitude for a title challenge, praise Lewis Hamilton's sterling recovery drive, and score the pre-race predictions!

item.title: Questioning Our Ferrari Fandom!
item.description: In this episode of #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket congratulate McLaren on yet another 1-2 and rue the Ferrari curse as they question their fandom for the Scuderia after a dismal underperformance at Budapest by snatching defeat from the jaws of victory.

item.title: Are We UNFAIR on Lando Norris?
item.description: In this episode of #PodOnTheApex, Pratyush and Aniket question if Lando Norris is getting a raw deal from the media, while Oscar Piastri is getting a free pass!

item.title: Cadillac is READY!
item.description: Cadillac announced their F1 driver lineup for 2026 today! With Sergio Perez and Valtteri Bottas leading the grid's newest team, we couldn't be more excited!

item.title: Will Max Return to Winning Ways at Zandvoort?
item.description: The summer break is over and it is time to gaze at the crystal ball and make some predictions for the Dutch GP at Zandvoort! Can Max Verstappen return to winning ways? Will Ferrari finally get their act together? Can McLaren continue their winning streak? Join Pratyush and Aniket as they preview the weekend with their predictions!

item.title: Celebrating Isack Hadjar and Commiserating Lando Norris!
item.description: On this episode of #PodOnTheApex, we pop the champagne for Isack Hadjar's incredible maiden F1 podium at Zandvoort! We also analyze what went wrong for Lando Norris's disastrous weekend, question if Lewis Hamilton can truly come back in the new regulations era of 2026, and round it out with our spicy Monza predictions and a must-hear Ferrari conspiracy theory for the Italian Grand Prix!

item.title: The Papaya Drama at Monza!
item.description: What was McLaren thinking at Monza? Does Max Verstappen have a chance to win a 5th consecutive title? Will Lewis Hamilton see the podium this season? All this and more with Pratyush and Aniket on this episode of #PodOnTheApex!

item.title: Papaya Lunch for the Bulls at Baku!
item.description: Is McLaren's Baku misfortune a one-off or are we witnessing a generational title charge from the four-time world champion? Has Carlos Sainz finally conquered his Williams demons? And what was that radio message from Charles Leclerc? Pratyush and Aniket tackle all these questions and more on this episode of #PodOnTheApex!

item.title: Will Max Continue His Hot Streak at Singapore?
item.description: It is time for the F1 Night Race and Pratyush and Aniket are back with some Predictions on the Apex for the Singapore GP! Can Max Verstappen continue his winning streak? Or will McLaren bounce back to form? And how many side quests will Max Verstappen aim to finish? All this and more on this episode of #PodOnTheApex!

item.title: It is a George Russell World at Singapore!
item.description: George Russell defied the odds to take home a famous victory at the Singapore GP while McLaren sealed the World Constructor's Championship in the Lion City! Watch Pratyush and Aniket break down all the action and wonder if Oscar Piastri is now feeling the heat from Lando Norris and maybe even Max Verstappen in the latest episode of #PodOnTheApex!

item.title: Who Will Say Yeehaw at Austin?
item.description: The F1 circus heads to the Lone Star State for the United States GP at Austin! Who will come out on top? Will Max Verstappen continue to shrink the gap to the papaya boys? Or will Oscar Piastri return to form and secure a dominant win? Or maybe we see the two McLaren drivers crash each other out? Watch Pratyush and Aniket deliver the Austin predictions on this episode of #PodOnTheApex and make sure to leave a comment below on who you think is winning it all this weekend!
